subject: Attn; beneficiary;
body:
Attn; beneficiary;
THE TOTAL OF FUND WILL ARE GOING TRANSFER TO YOU IS $$1.5 MILLION
Information reaching us from our Western Union Corporate Headquarters now, States that you only have 48hours to effect payment for the activation of your $1,500,000:00 USD to enable you cash up your total (fund) since you are finding it difficult to make the total payment, 
We have decided that you are to go ahead and pay whatever you have for the activation fee since you are not able to come up with the total required sum
. Time is of the essence here. You are to pay whatever you have as activation fee; we will activate your fund upon receipt of this payment to enable you receive your first $5,000:00 USD from any Western Union center around you today. Be informed that you will have to pay the balance sum of your activation upon cashing up of your first payment.
Also i am using this medium to inform you that failure to pay the balance sum will leave us with no option but to deactivate your fund of which you will and can never cash up your total sum again i want you to use Western Union to send whatever you have for the activation fee with the information Bellow.
Receiver name: Nze Chuks
Receiver city: COTONOU.
Receiver country: BENIN.
Country code: 229.
Text question: COLOUR.
Text answer: BLUE.
Amount: YOU CAN PAY ANY AMOUNT YOU HAVE NOW.
(M.T.C.N) Money Transfer Control Number ::::::::
Sender's name ::::::::
Kindly reconfirm to him the following below information:
Your full name__________________
Your address______________________
Your country________________________
Your Phone number_____________________
Your ID
______________________
Send us the MTCN number, Sender Address, immediately you send the money and immediately we confirm the activation fee, we will transfer you the fund today and not tomorrow. send the payment to my WhatsApp phone line is +229 6649 4730  Miss. Brenda Smith. For your payment, Email me On the Email Address:(
mmoneygram458@gmail.com
)
I promise you as soon as we hear from you with the payment of ANY
AMOUNT YOU HAVE NOW will tell you to send today, we shall send your
first payment of $5,000.00 for you to pick up with the information you
need to receive your payment the same day you send the payment of ANY
AMOUNT and I swear you will receive your payment immediately.
EMAIL ME THE MTCN NUMBER OR CAIL ME OK I AM WAITIG.
Miss. Brenda Smith.
Head Office Operations Manager.
Western Union Office Department
WhatsApp phone line is +229 6649 4730 Only
Email Address:(
mmoneygram458@gmail.com
)

subject: Re: Attn; beneficiary;
body:
Hello Miss Brenda Smith,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an interesting proposition. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please explain to me in more detail about this activation fee? What exactly does it cover and why is it necessary?

Secondly, you mentioned that I can pay any amount now and the balance later. Could you clarify how much the total activation fee is?

Lastly, once the fund is activated, how will I be able to access it? Will it be through Western Union or some other means?

I look forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Attn; beneficiary;
body:
Attention Email Address Owner:

How are you doing? I hope that you are doing well together with your
family? The activation fee is to enable us activation your payment files
through our payment system before we can be able to get the payment
information like MTCN number.

Total fee of the activation is $150 dollars

After the activation of the payment we shall give you all the details
information which you can be use to pick up the first payment until the
total amount is completed.

I will be waiting for your urgent response so that i will give you payment
details.

Miss. Brenda Smith
GENERAL OPERATION MANAGER.
VITAL FINANCE
WESTERN UNION DEPARTMENT
Western UnionA®
Send Money Worldwide

subject: Re: Attn; beneficiary;
body:
Hello Miss Brenda Smith,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your quick response and the detailed information about the activation process. It's interesting to know how these things work.

Could you please explain a bit more about what the activation fee is used for? And why is it necessary for getting the MTCN number?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

body:

subject: Re: Attn; beneficiary;
body:
Hello Miss Brenda Smith,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information about the MTCN control number. It's good to know that it can be picked up at any nearby Western Union money transfer.

Could you please provide more details about this payment process? How does it work exactly? And what are the next steps I should take?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James
